fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Single market, Transport
eu_initiatives: Internal market, EPC, Package Travel, Tourism Policy, Cultural heritage Policy, Collaborative Economy, CPD, Accessible Tourism, Sustainability
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Member of Euroepan Tourist Guide Federation (FEG) 
Member of World Federation of Tourist Guide Associations (WFTGA) 
Member of SETE (Greek Tourism Enterprises Association)
goals__remit: To protect and promote the interests of professional licensed tourist guides of Greece and the the guiding services the consumers recieve in Greece, to promote the national cultural, archaeological and historical heritage of Greece, to support tourist guides' high quality training, insurance, social security and life-long learning with conventions and seminars
